# RizzosAI Sales Website

This is the sales website for RizzosAI domain packages, deployed to domain.rizzosai.com.

## Project Overview
- Python Flask web application
- Sales page for RizzosAI domain packages ($29, $99, $249, $499)
- Customer redirect functionality to backoffice after purchase
- Render cloud deployment ready
- Professional Australian-themed design

## Features
- Package sales page with detailed guide descriptions
- Stripe payment integration links
- Post-purchase redirect to backoffice.rizzosai.com
- Responsive design
- SEO optimized

## Development
- Framework: Flask (Python)
- Deployment: Render
- Domain: domain.rizzosai.com
